logical_flow: The narrative begins with an overview of the dataset, providing context through the distribution of papers by conference, type, and author country. It then delves into distribution analysis, examining how citations and downloads are spread across the dataset. Temporal trends are explored next, highlighting changes in publications and citations over time. Relationship analysis follows, uncovering correlations between downloads, citations, paper types, and conferences. The paper concludes with advanced insights, identifying top-cited papers and countries, and analyzing average citations and downloads, synthesizing the findings into actionable insights.
flow_justification: This order creates a compelling story by starting with a broad overview, gradually narrowing down to specific trends and relationships, and finally synthesizing the insights into meaningful conclusions. Each stage builds on the previous one, ensuring a logical progression that enhances understanding and engagement.
